1. OnePlus ‘Turbo’ certainly looks like a phone with a big battery in leaked images [Gallery]  9to5Google
  2. Exclusive: OnePlus Turbo Leaks In Live Images With Massive 9,000mAh Battery and 144Hz Display  Android Headlines
  3. OnePlus reportedly developing a phone with battery bigger than two Galaxy S25s combined  Android Central
  4. OnePlus Smartphone Packs Massive 9,000mAh Battery for Multi-Day Endurance  WebProNews
  5. OnePlus makes Turbo series official: 165Hz refresh rate, Fengchi gaming kernel confirmed  Gizmochina
